issue.title: Current default branch tip cannot skip checkpoints

content.raw:
Ok I discovered what the issue was. I was using the worlds and models from the default branch but the rebuild plugins where not being loaded due to a path mistake.

Now that I am properly using the rebuild plugins as well skiping works.

Sorry for the noise.
content.html:
Ok I discovered what the issue was. I was using the worlds and models from the default branch but the rebuild plugins where not being loaded due to a path mistake.

Now that I am properly using the rebuild plugins as well skiping works.

Sorry for the noise.
